article_title: My struggle to keep family safe while reporting the Gaza war
sentence: His  wife,  teenage  son,  seven-year-old  daughter  and  one-year-old  grandson  were  killed.

article_title: My struggle to keep family safe while reporting the Gaza war
sentence: When  we  realised  Hamas  had  breached  the  fence  into  Israel  -  in  its  assault  that  saw  about  1,200  people  killed  and  250  taken  hostage  -  we  knew  the  response  from  Israel  would  be  like  nothing  we  had  seen  before.

article_title: My struggle to keep family safe while reporting the Gaza war
sentence: More  than  100  journalists  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  7  October,  according  to  Reporters  Without  Borders  -  the  vast  majority  are  known  to  be  Palestinian.
